articles.title: "What We Need Now...": Trump Rejects Gun Control Calls After Texas Horror - NDTV
articles.description: Former US president Donald Trump rejected calls for tightened gun controls Friday following the Texas school massacre, saying decent Americans should be allowed the firearms they need to defend themselves against "evil."
articles.content:
